title: Top Floor 2 Bed Apt - Washer/Dryer, Walk-in Closet & Balcony!
neighborhood: 505 N. Figueroa St., Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: ['Imagine a home where the fine art of living has been perfected.', 'Welcome to The Orsini, home to the best apartments in downtown Los Angeles.', 'From the moment you enter the elegant Mediterranean inspired 2-story foyer at The Orsini, you will realize that you have come home to a new experience in luxury apartment living.', 'We are in the heart of Los Angeles, California and the pulse of extraordinary living.', 'Enjoy a short commute to the LA Fashion District, Staples Center, Disney Concert Hall, Chinatown and all the amazing dining and glamorous shopping that living in Los Angeles has to offer.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Junior Olympic-Size Swimming Pool and Spa (Heated for Year-Round Use)', '-Individual Apartment Balconies or Patios', '-Volleyball Court', '-Putting Green', '-Additional Monthly Parking Available', '-Outdoor', 'Putting Green', '-Gorgeous Water Fountains at Every Corner', '-Sand Volleyball Court', '-24-7 On-site Management', '-Fire Pit', '-Den/Study', '-Clear Glass Shower Enclosures', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '505 N. Figueroa St., Los Angeles, CA 90012', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'Luxury Housing,  Los Angeles Housing,  Fashion Institute Housing,  Downtown Los Angeles,  DTLA Housing,  Luxury Apartments,  Central Los Angeles,  Industrial District,  Griffith Park,  Downtown Los Angeles Apartments,  DTLA,  USC Apartments,  Downtown LA Apartments,  Windsor Square,  Toy District,  USC Housing,  Los Angeles Apartments,  Historic Core,  University of Southern California,  Central Los Angeles Apartments,  University of Southern California Housing,  Hollywood Hills,  FIDM,  Financial District,  Civic Center,  Central Los Angeles Housing,  Student Apartments,  DT Los Angeles,  Student Housing,  Hancock Park,  Wholesale District,  Los Angeles,  Downtown LA Housing,  South Park,  Fashion Institute Apartments,  Pico-Union,  DT Los Angeles Housing,  DT Los Angeles Apartments, Downtown,  Central LA,  Arts District,  FIDM Apartments,  DTLA Apartments,  Central LA Housing,  Downtown Los Angeles Housing,  Silver Lake,  Larchmont,  Elysian Park,  Fashion District,  Downtown Apartments,  Bunker Hill,  Westlake,  Downtown Housing,  Old Bank District,  Carthay,  Koreatown,  USC,  University of Southern California Apartments,  Harvard Heights,  Arlington Heights,  Downtown LA,  Warehouse District,  Los Feliz,  FIDM Housing,  Gallery Row,  Mid-City,  Hollywood Hills West,  Jewelry District,  Central LA Apartments,  Fashion Institute,  Hollywood,  Echo Park,  East Hollywood,  Little Tokyo,  Chinatown,  Elysian Valley']
